about_the_game:
Forest Terror 2 is a cooperative first person adventure game with horror elements in which you will have to survive and complete quests with your friends in the mysterious forest of Eastern Hare.

Story

Following the death of the last of the ancients gods, many evil entities have risen to rule the place. You and a few other individuals, including Paimonic knights, Atria's servants and Meruem's enigmatic followers, have been summoned by a mysterious priestess to put an end to the evil entities that lurk in the forest.

So... will you be brave enough to walk through the woods?

A challenging coop experience

Forest Terror 2 is a challenging game in which cooperation with your friends will be paramount to your survival. A game can accommodate up to 5 players so feel free to bring your friends to ensure your survival.

You will have to fight against the inferior creatures that lurk in the forest as well as their powerful bosses that try to rule the place.

Select your hero

You can choose between 3 different character classes.

Meruem's disciple
The followers of Meruem are part of a mysterious order that worships the ancient god Meruem. Their mastery of magic is a great asset in order to make their way through the woods.


Servant of Atria
Guided by the light, the servants of Atria have unique gifts that allow them to heal the deepest wounds or to revive the dead.


Paimon's Knight
The knights of Paimon, also called Paimonic knights, have undergone rigorous training in the mastery of the "talent" that allows them, armed with their magical blades, to overcome the toughest enemies.

Become stronger

Start at level 1 and unlock new spells as you level up through the forest and quests.

name: Forest Terror 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 710 (1GB), Intel HD Graphics 630 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Forest Terror 2 is a cooperative first person adventure game with horror elements in which you will have to survive and complete quests with your friends in the mysterious forest of Eastern Hare.
